ac.special: 11 + the level of the spell (armadura natural)

trait.name: Regeneration (Slaad Only)
entries: The aberration regains 5 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point.

trait.name: Whispering Aura (Star Spawn Only)
entries: At the start of each of the aberration's turns, each creature within 5 feet of the aberration must succeed on a Saviesa saving throw against your spell save DC or take {@damage 2d6} de dany psíquic, provided that the aberration isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The aberration makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

action.name: Eye Ray (Beholderkin Only)
entries: {@atk rs} {@hitYourSpellAttack} a impactar, 150 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}{@damage 1d8 + 3 + summonSpellLevel} de dany psíquic.

action.name: Claws (Slaad Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hitYourSpellAttack} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}{@damage 1d10 + 3 + summonSpellLevel} de dany tallant. If the target is a creature, it can't regain hit points until the start of the aberration's next turn.

action.name: Psychic Slam (Star Spawn Only)
entries: {@atk ms} {@hitYourSpellAttack} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}{@damage 1d8 + 3 + summonSpellLevel} de dany psíquic.

hp.special: 5 + five times your ranger level (the beast has a number of Hit Dice [d8s] equal to your ranger level)

trait.name: Carregar
entries: If the beast moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a maul attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra {@damage 1d6} de dany tallant. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a Força saving throw against your spell save DC or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Primal Bond
entries: You can add your proficiency bonus to any ability check or saving throw that the beast makes.

action.name: Maul
entries: {@atk mw} {@hitYourSpellAttack} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}{@damage 1d8 + 2 + BC} de dany tallant.

hp.special: 5 + five times your ranger level (the beast has a number of Hit Dice [d8s] equal to your ranger level)

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The beast can breathe both air and water.

trait.name: Primal Bond
entries: You can add your proficiency bonus to any ability check or saving throw that the beast makes.

action.name: Binding Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hitYourSpellAttack} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}{@damage 1d6 + 2 + BC} de dany perforant or {@damage 1d6 + 2 + BC} de dany contundent (your choice), and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape DC equal to your spellcasting save DC). Until this grapple ends, the beast can't use this attack on another target.

hp.special: 4 + four times your ranger level (the beast has a number of Hit Dice [d6s] equal to your ranger level)

trait.name: Passar Volant
entries: The beast no provoca atacs d'oportunitats quan surt volant de l'abast d'un enemic

trait.name: Primal Bond
entries: You can add your proficiency bonus to any ability check or saving throw that the beast makes.

action.name: Triturar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hitYourSpellAttack} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}{@damage 1d4 + 3 + BC} de dany tallant

ac.special: 11 + the level of the spell (armadura natural)

hp.special: 20 (Air only) or 30 (Land and Water only) + 5 for each spell level above 2nd

trait.name: Water Breathing (Water Only)
entries: The beast can breathe only underwater.

trait.name: Flyby (Air Only)
entries: The beast no provoca atacs d'oportunitats quan surt volant de l'abast d'un enemic

trait.name: Pack Tactics (Land and Water Only)
entries: The beast has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the beast's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The beast makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

action.name: Maul
entries: {@atk mw} {@hitYourSpellAttack} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}{@damage 1d8 + 4 + summonSpellLevel} de dany perforant.

ac.special: 11 + the level of the spell (armadura natural) + 2 (Defender only)

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The celestial makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

action.name: Radiant Bow (Avenger Only)
entries: {@atk rw} {@hitYourSpellAttack} a impactar, 150/600 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}{@damage 2d6 + 2 + summonSpellLevel} de dany radiant.

action.name: Radiant Mace (Defender Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hitYourSpellAttack} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}{@damage 1d10 + 3 + summonSpellLevel} de dany radiant, and the celestial can choose itself or another creature it can see within 10 feet of the target. The chosen creature gains {@dice 1d10} temporary hit points.

action.name: Toc Curatiu (1/Dia)
entries: The celestial touches another creature. The target magically regains hit points equal to {@dice 2d8 + summonSpellLevel}.

ac.special: 13 + the level of the spell (armadura natural)

trait.name: Heated Body (Metal Only)
entries: A creature that touches the construct or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes {@damage 1d10} de dany de foc.

trait.name: Stony Lethargy (Stone Only)
entries: When a creature the construct can see starts its turn within 10 feet of the construct, the construct can force it to make a Saviesa saving throw against your spell save DC. On a failed save, the target can't use reactions and its speed is halved until the start of its next turn.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The construct makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hitYourSpellAttack} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}{@damage 1d8 + 4 + summonSpellLevel} de dany contundent.

reaction.name: Berserk Lashing (Clay Only)
entries: When the construct takes damage, it makes a slam attack against a random creature within 5 feet of it. If no creature is within reach, the construct moves up to half its speed toward an enemy it can see, without provoking opportunity attacks.

trait.name: Forma Immutable
entries: L'objecte es immune a tot conjur o efecte que n'alteri la forma

trait.name: Irrepressible Dance
entries: When any creature starts its turn within 10 feet of the item, the item can increase or decrease (your choice) the walking speed of that creature by 10 feet until the end of the turn, provided the item isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Colpeig de Força
entries: {@atk mw} {@hitYourSpellAttack} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu que puguis veure. {@h}{@damage 1d10 + BC} de dany de força.

ac.special: 11 + the level of the spell (armadura natural)

trait.name: Amorphous Form (Air, Fire, and Water Only)
entries: The elemental can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The elemental makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hitYourSpellAttack} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}{@damage 1d10 + 4 + summonSpellLevel} de dany contundent (Air, Earth, and Water only) or fire damage (Fire only).

ac.special: 12 + the level of the spell (armadura natural)

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The fey makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

action.name: Espasa curta
entries: {@atk mw} {@hitYourSpellAttack} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}{@damage 1d6 + 3 + summonSpellLevel} de dany perforant{@damage  + 1d6} de dany de força.

bonus.name: Fey Step
entries: The fey magically teleports up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. Then one of the following effects occurs, based on the fey's chosen mood:

items.name: Fuming.
items.entry: The fey has advantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of this turn.

items.name: Mirthful.
items.entry: The fey can force one creature it can see within 10 feet of it to make a Saviesa saving throw against your spell save DC. Unless the save succeeds, the target is charmed by you and the fey for 1 minute or until the target takes any damage.

items.name: Tricksy.
items.entry: The fey can fill a 5-foot cube within 5 feet of it with magical darkness, which lasts fins el final del seu proper torn.

ac.special: 12 + the level of the spell (armadura natural)

hp.special: 50 (Demon only) or 40 (Devil only) or 60 (Yugoloth only) + 15 for each spell level above 6th

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The fiend té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

trait.name: Death Throes (Demon Only)
entries: When the fiend drops to 0 hit points or the spell ends, the fiend explodes, and each creature within 10 feet of ha de salvar per Destresa against your spell save DC. A creature takes {@damage 2d10 + summonSpellLevel} de dany de foc on a failed save, ; si supera, en rep la meitat.

trait.name: Devil's Sight (Devil Only)
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the fiend's darkvision.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The fiend makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

action.name: Bite (Demon Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hitYourSpellAttack} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}{@damage 1d12 + 3 + summonSpellLevel} de dany necròtic.

action.name: Claws (Yugoloth Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hitYourSpellAttack} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}{@damage 1d8 + 3 + summonSpellLevel} de dany tallant. Immediately after the attack hits or misses, the fiend can magically teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

action.name: Hurl Flame (Devil Only)
entries: {@atk rs} {@hitYourSpellAttack} a impactar, 150 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}{@damage 2d6 + 3 + summonSpellLevel} de dany de foc. If the target is a flammable object that isn't being worn or carried, it also catches fire.

hp.special: 1 + your Intel·ligència modifier + your artificer level (the homunculus has a number of Hit Dice [d4s] equal to your artificer level)

trait.name: Evasion
entries: If the homunculus is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Destresa saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails. It can't use this trait if it's {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Force Strike
entries: {@atk rw} {@hitYourSpellAttack} a impactar, 30 peus d'abast, un objectiu que puguis veure. {@h}{@damage 1d4 + BC} de dany de força.

reaction.name: Channel Magic
entries: The homunculus delivers a spell you cast that has a range of touch. The homunculus must be within 120 feet of you.

trait.name: False Appearance (Object Form Only)
entries: While the mimic remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary object.

trait.name: Grimpat d'Aranya
entries: The mimic pot escalar superfícies difícils (incloent cap per avall pels sostres) sense haver de fer una tirada d'habilitat.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}1 piercing damage plus 2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany d'àcid.

action.name: Shape-Shift
entries: The mimic polymorphs into an object or back into its true, amorphous form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

monster.name: Poderós Servent d'en Leuk-o
languages: understands the languages of creatures attuned to it but can't speak

trait.name: Immutable Existence
entries: The servant is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form or send it to another plane of existence.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: The servant has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects, and spell attacks made against it have disadvantage.

trait.name: Regeneració
entries: The servant regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If it is reduced to 0 hit points, this trait doesn't function until an attuned creature spends 24 hours repairing the artifact or until the artifact is subjected to lightning damage.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The servant's long jump is up to 50 feet and its high jump is up to 25 feet, with or without a running start.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The servant doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

action.name: Destructive Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}36 ({@damage 4d12 + 10}) de dany de força. Or Ranged Weapon Attack: {@hit 17} a impactar, 120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}36 ({@damage 4d12 + 10}) de dany de força. If the target is an object, it takes triple damage.

action.name: Crushing Leap
entries: If the servant jumps at least 25 feet as part of its movement, it can then use this action to land on its feet in a space that contains one or more other creatures. Each of those creatures is pushed to an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the servant and must make a {@dc 25} Destresa saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 26 ({@damage 4d12}) de dany contundent and is knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't knocked {@condition prone}.

ac.special: 11 + the level of the spell (armadura natural)

trait.name: Terror Frenzy (Fury Only)
entries: The spirit has advantage on attack rolls against {@condition frightened} creatures.

trait.name: Weight of Sorrow (Despair Only)
entries: Any creature, other than you, that starts its turn within 5 feet of the spirit has its speed reduced by 20 feet until the start of that creature's next turn.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The spirit makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

action.name: Chilling Rend
entries: {@atk mw} {@hitYourSpellAttack} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}{@damage 1d12 + 3 + summonSpellLevel} de dany de fred.

action.name: Dreadful Scream (1/Dia)
entries: The spirit screams. Each creature within 30 feet of it must succeed on a Saviesa saving throw against your spell save DC or be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. La criatura {@condition frightened} pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera.

bonus.name: Shadow Stealth (Fear Only)
entries: While in dim light or darkness, the spirit takes the Hide action.

hp.special: 2 + your Intel·ligència modifier + five times your artificer level (the defender has a number of Hit Dice [d8s] equal to your artificer level)

trait.name: Vigilant
entries: The defender can't be surprised.

action.name: Force-Empowered Rend
entries: {@atk mw} {@hitYourSpellAttack} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu que puguis veure. {@h}{@damage 1d8 + BC} de dany de força.

action.name: Reparar (3/Dia)
entries: The magical mechanisms inside the defender restore {@dice 2d8 + BC} hit points to itself or to one construct or object within 5 feet of it.

reaction.name: Deflect Attack
entries: The defender imposes disadvantage on the attack roll of one creature it can see that is within 5 feet of it, provided the attack roll is against a creature other than the defender.

ac.special: 11 + the level of the spell (armadura natural)

hp.special: 30 (Ghostly and Putrid only) or 20 (Skeletal only) + 10 for each spell level above 3rd

trait.name: Incorporeal Passage (Ghostly Only)
entries: The spirit can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. If it ends its turn inside an object, it is shunted to the nearest unoccupied space and takes {@damage 1d10} de dany de força for every 5 feet traveled.

trait.name: Festering Aura (Putrid Only)
entries: Any creature, other than you, that starts its turn within 5 feet of the spirit must succeed on a Constitució saving throw against your spell save DC or be {@condition poisoned} until the start of its next turn.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The spirit makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

action.name: Deathly Touch (Ghostly Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hitYourSpellAttack} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}{@damage 1d8 + 3 + summonSpellLevel} de dany necròtic, and the creature must succeed on a Saviesa saving throw against your spell save DC or be {@condition frightened} of the undead until the end of the target's next turn.

action.name: Grave Bolt (Skeletal Only)
entries: {@atk rs} {@hitYourSpellAttack} a impactar, 150 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}{@damage 2d4 + 3 + summonSpellLevel} de dany necròtic.

action.name: Rotting Claw (Putrid Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hitYourSpellAttack} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}{@damage 1d6 + 3 + summonSpellLevel} de dany tallant. If the target is {@condition poisoned}, it must succeed on a Constitució saving throw against your spell save DC or be {@condition paralyzed} fins el final del seu proper torn.

action.name: Pinyol de Foc
entries: {@atk rw} {@hitYourSpellAttack} a impactar, 60 peus d'abast, un objectiu que puguis veure. {@h}{@damage 1d6 + BC} de dany de foc.

action.name: Teletransport Encès
entries: The spirit and each willing creature of your choice within 5 feet of it teleport up to 15 feet to unoccupied spaces you can see. Then each creature within 5 feet of the space that the spirit left must succeed on a Destresa saving throw against your spell save DC or take {@damage 1d6 + BC} de dany de foc.
